thread.title: BRIEF-Sparkle Roll Group Expects Net Profit Of Group For Year Ending 31 March 2018 To Increase

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sparkle Roll Group Expects Net Profit Of Group For Year Ending 31 March 2018 To Increase

organizations.name: brief-sparkle roll group expects net profit of group

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Sparkle Roll Group Ltd:
* EXPECTED THAT NET PROFIT OF GROUP FOR YEAR ENDING 31 MARCH 2018 WILL INCREASE SIGNIFICANTLY
* EXPECTED REASON DUE TO ‍ CHANGE IN ACCOUNTING TREATMENT ON INVESTMENT IN B&O, INCREASING CONSOLIDATED NET PROFIT​ BY ABOUT HK$580 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
